title: is pes actually good?

Choose cse in EC campus over ECE in RR..PES has the highest glory in cse placements from what I checked

Every college has some issues and some advantages:

BMS  
pros : relaxed schedule (5 hours per day for 1st year), relaxed syllabus and load, some event or fest every 2 weeks. 
cons : small campus, not so good placements 

PES
pros : tougher but better for you curriculum, infrastructure, good placements (compared to BMS)
cons : the syllabus is too overwhelming, not that much fests, strict and loaded schedule 

RVCE (Best imo)
pros : best placements among any private college in Bengaluru, good crowd 
cons : well RVU issue is there so placements are ought to degrade, not much cons tbh
